name: TOY CAR
description:
Keyboard & Mouse
Xbox Controller
AccelerateWRight Trigger
Brake / Reverse
SLeft TriggerSteerA / D
Left Stick
JumpSpace bar
ABoostLeft Shift
BTiltLeft Click / Right Click
Left Stick
Reset Car
RD-Pad Down

Hello dear gamer.

Do you remember playing with blocks? Do you still play with blocks? We're not here to judge. In fact quite the contrary! We want to feed that deep desire to bust block structures apart and you don't even need to clean up afterwards!

In this game you play as a toy car on a table top where you can collect stars to get a high score or just drive for fun and demolish structures.

A small project created by two students for a 4 week long analytics based assignment. We are studying Game Art and Development in our second year.
